## Welcome to R-DAVIS

**R for Data Analysis & Visualization in Science**

Lectures: 1:10-3:00pm, Thursdays, Walker Hall 1320
Labs: 1:10-3:00pm, Tuesdays, Walker Hall 1320

This graduate-level course provides training in data science with R, focusing on reproducible research practices and practical skills for environmental data analysis.
